title: Sonali Deraniyagala’s tsunami memoir: One of the saddest stories a human being could ever tell
content: – Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana – Time has not healed the wounds Sonali Deraniyagala suffered when rising waters of the devastating Indian Ocean tsunami engulfed her eight years ago on the southern coast of Sri Lanka, killing her parents, her husband and her two young sons while leaving her stunned and speechless on a mud…
